result.markdown:
--- title: "Scaled cases" author: Raphael Saldanha date: last-modified --- This notebook aims to cluster the Brazilian municipalities considering scaled (standardized) dengue cases time-series similarities. ## Packages ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) library(lubridate) library(arrow) library(timetk) library(dtwclust) library(kableExtra) library(tictoc) source("../functions.R") ``` ::: ## Load data Load the aggregated data. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tdengue <- open_dataset(sources = data_dir("bundled_data/tdengue.parquet")) %>% select(mun, date, cases) %>% collect() dim(tdengue) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 163326 3 ``` ::: ::: ### Prepare data The chunk bellow executes various steps to prepare the data for clustering. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tdengue <- tdengue %>% # Prepare time series mutate(mun = paste0("m_", mun)) %>% arrange(mun, date) %>% pivot_wider(names_from = mun, values_from = cases) %>% select(-date) %>% t() %>% tslist() ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} length(tdengue) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 326 ``` ::: ::: ## Clustering Sequence of `k` groups to be used. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} k_seq <- 3:10 ``` ::: ### SBD method ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tic() clust <- tsclust( series = tdengue, type = "partitional", k = k_seq, distance = "sbd", seed = 13 ) toc() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` 0.262 sec elapsed ``` ::: ::: ### Cluster Validity Indices (CVI) ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} names(clust) <- paste0("k_", k_seq) res_cvi <- sapply(clust, cvi, type = "internal") %>% t() %>% as_tibble(rownames = "k") %>% arrange(-Sil) res_cvi %>% kbl() %>% kable_styling() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
k Sil SF CH DB DBstar D COP
k_3 0.2188452 0.2749219 43.44095 2.074648 2.311429 0.0996966 0.3812143
k_5 0.1640128 0.2102233 29.01509 2.536186 2.844726 0.0947359 0.3524423
k_4 0.1508311 0.2223184 13.05253 5.973924 6.900517 0.0606789 0.3796916
k_8 0.0463547 0.1216345 17.87574 4.897435 6.673940 0.0343626 0.3256716
k_6 0.0369942 0.1578067 26.08539 3.552607 5.249421 0.0266973 0.3448239
k_7 0.0309825 0.1369429 25.97896 3.419628 4.805177 0.0253985 0.3317296
k_9 0.0091394 0.0624334 15.87486 5.085732 8.319458 0.0303998 0.3334025
k_10 0.0024394 0.0651816 20.58572 2.831873 4.006410 0.0307869 0.3105858
````` ::: ::: ### Cluster with higher Silhouette statistic ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} sel_clust <- clust[[res_cvi[[1,1]]]] ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} plot(sel_clust) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](cluster_long_scaled_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggsave(filename = "cluster_long_scaled.pdf") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Saving 7 x 5 in image ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} plot(sel_clust, type = "centroids", lty = 1) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](cluster_long_scaled_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ### Cluster sizes ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} table(sel_clust@cluster) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` 1 2 3 271 47 8 ``` ::: ::: ## Session info ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} sessionInfo() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` R version 4.1.2 (2021-11-01) Platform:
